title: Лада Голд
overview: Arthur, the grandson of the crime boss Midas, is forced to return from the Netherlands to Russia for his grandfather's funeral. Pavel, the grandson of the hero policeman Ogurtsov, well-known throughout Togliatti, got bogged down in problems with his family, girlfriend and money. Both guys embark on the adventure of a lifetime on Lada-21043, made entirely of gangster gold. The car and the guys are being hunted by the leaders of three gangster groups who have just been released from prison — Bald, Buba and Grishka-singer, as well as Shamray, who will do anything to regain gold, influence and power.
